title: Helpem Mifala: aid for Solomon Islands
creator_contributor_role: Australian Agency for International Development, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Medical assistance - Developing countries

description: Examines Australia's aid scheme to the Solomon Islands which became independent in 1978. As well as financial aid, technical and medical advisors are assisting the Islands in their development. Photographer - Dean Semler; editor - Sue Horsley; sound - Bob Hayes.
